price: 25. Markay u soo galeen oo yidhaahdeen: nabad ahow, wuxuu yidhi: nabad ahaada. (waxaad tihiin) qolo aan la garaneyn.
arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗاۖ قَالَ سَلَٰمٞ قَوۡمٞ مُّنكَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh dakhalū ʿalayhi faqālū salāman qāla salāmun qawmun munkarūna
